text: Eagles wide receiver Harold Carmichael scoring a touchdown against the New Orleans Saints in 1977 The 1977 Philadelphia Eagles season was the franchise's 45th season in the National Football League. The team improved upon their previous output of 4–10, winning five games.1977 Philadelphia Eagles Despite the improvement, the team failed to qualify for the playoffs for the seventeenth consecutive season. ==Offseason== ===NFL Draft=== ===Player Selections=== The table shows the Eagles selections and what picks they had that were traded away and the team that ended up with that pick. It is possible the Eagles' pick ended up with this team via another team that the Eagles made a trade with.
